Hi, I'm Anup. I'm an engineer trying to design and build better interactions for educational systems.

I use a blend of HCI research and electronics prototyping to reduce the seams between us and our devices.

When I'm not working, I read, ride motorcycles, or watch British panel shows ad nauseam.

I also keep track of what I've done and I write things that I would read.

You can see some of my work below.

DopeScope

An inexpensive scope for hobbyists and learners
